      • HttpRequest

        public HttpRequest(java.lang.String sUrl,
           java.net.URL oReferUrl,
           java.lang.String sMethod,
           NameValuePair[] aParams)
        Create new request for the given URL
        Parameters:
        sUrl - String requested URL
        oReferUrl - String Referer URL
        sMethod - String Must be "get" or "post"
        aParams - Array of NameValuePair with parameters to be sent along with get or post
